bibl.title: with the assistance of B.C. Barker-Benfield], Papyri. An Exhibition of Papyri, mainly in Greek, at the Bodleian Library and at the Ashmolean Museum, for the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists, Oxford, 24-31 July 1974.
bibl.note: Dr. R.W. Hunt has contributed a note on the history of the Bodleian collections
bibl.seg: [Rea John R., with the assistance of B.C. Barker-Benfield], Papyri. An Exhibition of Papyri, mainly in Greek, at the Bodleian Library and at the Ashmolean Museum, for the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists, Oxford, 24-31 July 1974.
